reviewText: If your child loves the Mario series, this DVD is wonderful. My five year old and my seven year old love Mario everything - movies, plush toys, etc. This DVD is one of many they love to watch - they watch them over and over. This is a good value for Mario fans. 75 minutes run time.
My 4-year-old son LOVES Super Mario! These DVDs are great and have entertained him for hours. I'm a fan.
This was a gift for our grandson that he had requested.  I am sure he has enjoyed this...he loves Mario!.
Deff worth the purchase. This dvd is about $7 tops. Deff don't pay more than that. Lot of fun for your Mario fan in your home.

. . . for grandson, who has loved every
Super Mario Brothers DVD.  It's been a
while, but I'm sure he's seen this at least
twice.

Thank you very much for getting the dvd to us in great time. The dvd arrived in perfect condition and my daughter loves the show! Sorry it has taken so long ti give a review, there has been a lot going on in our lives.
My son loves any Mario. This was one of his christmas presents. You go mario keep it coming. I am done

The Mario episodes explain a bit more about the video gaming world of Mario. If your child loves Mario, these movies are a must.  I have a 9 year old that loves everything Mario. He loves watching the shows.

I bought this movie because my four year old loves anything Mario&Luigi!  Luigi is his favorite.  I feel it is appropriate for the smaller children.  It does not have any of your normal "Nick Jr." type education going on though.  Still I have no problems with this movie and I'm glad I made the purchase.  We have since collected about 4 more out of the series.  These movies brings the game they've been playing to a different level and let's them "get to know" the characters!  I would reccommend buying for any child who likes Mario!  If they like the game they will like the movie!
